name: Kelumo Media
overview:
At Kelumo Media, we’re in the business of making the community better – period. Through innovation and creativity, we’ve raised the bar and set the standard for what we believe high quality content means for the people’s of the Saddleworth.

Our content sites and products allow more than 1 thousand visitors around the world to access the best collection of journalists, artists and musicians on the web.

After 3 years, Kelumo Media is still very much a pioneer and we encourage you to come along for the ride and see what’s next.

We like to give the best of the Saddleworth area on the ‘net, be it from a Camera network to an Email service, using streaming technology’s to it’s best or even a Radio station. If it’s media, and its local then you can find it on Kelumo and on the Kelumo Media Network.

Founded from an acculmation of websites (BitCluster, JBTP and Kelumo it’s self) Kelumo is ran by Joe Peacock along with help from Ben Titterington, Andrew Kershaw, Lewis Brookfield and numerous other people. Kelumo want’s to spread the best of what Saddleworth has to offer all over the universe that is the Internet, from covering local events on online radio to streaming webcams of roads, if it helps people know what’s going on in our area then we’ll do it or help in someway or annother.
